abstract: Trapster and NMobile use social networking and GPS to warn Apple iPhone users about speed traps.
snippet: Trapster and NMobile use social networking and GPS to warn Apple iPhone users about speed traps.
lead_paragraph: UPDATED 11/21 12:15 p.m.: Correcting that iBeer and Pocket First Aid are among the top 10 most popular paid iPhone applications.

headline.main: New iPhone Apps Help Drivers Beat Speed Traps
